infoContent Union Reference

Definition of a data cluster information content data type. More...

#include <sofs_datacluster.h>

Data Fields

unsigned char data [BSLPC]
 byte stream
uint32_t ref [RPC]
 sub-array of data cluster references
SODirEntry de [DPC]
 sub-array of directory entries

Detailed Description

Definition of a data cluster information content data type.

It describes the different interpretations for the information content of a data cluster in use.

It may either contain:

  • a stream of bytes
  • a sub-array of data cluster references
  • a sub-array of directory entries.
